Product Details

{{ item.title }} {{ item.description }} Rs. {{ item.price }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-details', templateUrl: './product-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-details.component.css'], }) export class ProductDetailsComponent implements OnInit { productData: any = null; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { // Retrieve the parameter from the route this.productData = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('productData'); } }
